title: UI Menu lagging like hell.
body:
I get some in-game lag (spiking up to 200ms occasionally depsite telstra cable.  Thanks Aus Internet) But that's not what this is about.  I've been chating on voice coms with some others so I know this isn't just me.  The menu UI for pre-game selection, handling loot/store/game creation seems to lag like CRAZY at the moment.  Accepting invites and having waits of up to 20-30 seconds before it puts you in the game for example.  This seems to be a thing that started about 80% of the way through season 7, and has only gotten MUCH worse with the season 8 changes.  

Is my group of friends (spread across country/providers) alone in this or has RIOT Broken something?  It's making joining a game, or even checking missions etc painful.  Not to mention the 2-3 times it seems to have broken entirely and not allowed me to click on anything. (Had to re-start the client post-game when couldn't leave the post-game stats screen).

replies.body:
Yes this is something that is inherently wrong with the client, and is nothing new.

The new client is just a chunk of shit, that was made to look shinier then the last piece of shit we had.
Sorry for super-late reply . this had been going on pretty much the moment pre-season for 8 started.

Did this just start happening in 7.23, or has it been going on for a while? We put in some related changes in the client during that patch. Any details about what in particular feels laggy would be useful! How long does it take for you to log in, and what are the specs of your machine? Thanks!
I have this issue as well, and it's been there a long time. Would be nice for an update by a Rioter about the issue? :)
